question: please help! i think i have swimmers?
question_content: okay well my right ear was hurting about 2 days ago when i noticed it but yesterday it wasent really hurting as much! but i noticed my jaw started hurting! i got some drops that day for swimmers ear but i think that might have made it worser! and the instructions for it wasnt relly good so im not relly shur on how the correct way is to use them! but today my heads hurting my jaw hurts and i can barly heare out of my ear! eny help on getting rid of it?

answers.answer_content:
yes, get to the doctor. i got an ear infection due to swimmer's ear. swollen glands on that whole side of head too.  antibiotics is the only thing you can do now.  when you go swimming use ear plugs- they do work as a preventative. i was told if left untreated-deafness can occur.

good luck.
Jessica you need to go to the Dr., he will give you antibiotics I had the same thing but in both ears you need antibiotics hun...
